Initials: Initial L decorated with foliate ornament is beneath miniature
Costume: Pink surcote and crown on Amors, blue surcote with pendant sleeves and liripipe hood on L'Amans
Objects: L'Amans holds a glove, Amors holds a bow, arrow in L'Amans' chest
Other: The figures stand within a barbed quatrefoil; patterned backgrounds; the miniature has a gilt outer frame with trifoliate tendrils
